 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָעַר‎</span>] **verb** ==shake, shake out or off== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָעַר‎</span> ***shake, stir up***, especially Pi\`el, Niph\`al; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְעֹרֶת‎</span> ***tow*** (see below); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***boil, be in violent commotion, be very angry***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָעַ֫רְתִּי‎</span> [[Neh.5.13|Neh 5:13]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹעֵר‎</span> [[Isa.33.9|Isa 33:9]]; [[Isa.33.15|Isa 33:15]] ***passive*** [[Neh.5.13|Neh 5:13]] — ***shake out***, to shew emptiness, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָצְנִי נ‎</span> [[Neh.5.13|Neh 5:13]] (symbolic), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּפָּיו מִתְּמֹךְ בַּשֹּׁחַד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Isa.33.15|Isa 33:15]] participle ***shaken out, emptied*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָרֵק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Neh.5.13|Neh 5:13]] (i.e. stripped of possessions); ***shake off*** (leaves) [[Isa.33.9|Isa 33:9]] (compare \|\| clause). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַנְעַ֫רְתִּי כָאַרְבֶּה‎</span> [[Ps.109.23|Ps 109:23]] ***I am shaken out like a locust*** (from fold of a garment; simile of perishing helplessly); compare ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיִנָָּֽעֲרוּ רְשָׁעִים מִמֶּ֑נָּה‎</span> [[Job.38.13|Job 38:13]] to seize the corners of the earth ***that wicked men may be shaken out of it***; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִנָּעֵר‎</span> [[Judg.16.20|Judg 16:20]] ***I will shake myself*** (free ? compare Hithpa\`el and [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]). **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַעֵר‎</span> [[Neh.5.13|Neh 5:13]] ***so may*** God ***shake utterly out*** every man from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) his house, etc.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנַעֵר‎</span> [[Exod.14.27|Exod 14:27]] ***and*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***shook off*** the Egyptian into (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) the sea, = ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִעֵר‎</span> [[Ps.136.15|Ps 136:15]] (also with accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>). **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְנַעֲרִי מֵעָפָר‎</span> [[Isa.52.2|Isa 52:2]] ***shake thyself*** (***free***), etc. (of personified Zion).
